data.name: Raia Nova
data.detailed_description:
Behold the mighty fighters of the Mercury Scepter Tournament as they spill blood under a mysterious spell. Choose your hero and start your adventure through many worlds of challenging top down combat. Combine skills from a huge arsenal to make a unique kit to fit your playstyle or experience a new way to do battle. Say goodbye to tedious micro-upgrades to weapons and armor, the abilities are what matter, along with a unique skill tree to choose your progression. Play the way you want, some skills can be auto-cast in multiple ways, or stick to mechanical intensity with manual casting. Customize your survival strategy to be based on mobility, defense, and invincibility windows. Attack with fire, ice, poison, plagues, dissolving pools, grenades, cosmic rays, radiation, acid rain, and much more.

In this world, a great tournament was created by the great sage Sagathu. But when a mysterious mind wipe spell causes fighting, chaos, and memory loss, you begin to see there is much more happening beneath the surface. The world seems full of strange happenings, investigate the frozen fortress holding the power of the Breaker. Enter the terrifying dream world of Dhalia, the flower that draws blood. Face the greatest magic user alive beneath the spires of the Shining City.

data.short_description: The greatest tournament of all time has gone terribly wrong. Warriors from different lands do battle and form alliances in the wake of a strange mind wiping spell. Battle hordes of creatures and duel crazy characters in this funny fanservicey ARPG.
